module.name: product_placement
module.keywords: module, instance placement, part occurrence placement, organ placement

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the placement of a product occurrence in the coordinate space of a reference physical element.

uof.name: Product_placement
uof.description: The Product placement UOF specifies the data structure for the representation of the placement of a single part occurrence, of a physical element or a function occurrence with respect to a reference physical element.
